long_desc.thetext: Remove our old TOPSort as JDK provides sorting since 1.2. Also remove TOPComparison. Change code to use Compator and Arrays.sort().
Some code cleanup. - removed dead exception classes - removed old TOPSort -> Arrays.sort() - removed old FalseUndefiedTrue -> Boolean - removed EclipseLinkIdentityHashMap -> java.util.IdentityHashMap

Would the removed exceptions affect our documentation?
http://wiki.eclipse.org/EclipseLink_Exception_Error_Reference_%28ELUG%29
If so please open a bug or email Rick Sapir.
Yes, docs should remove the dead exceptions.
